definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Don't say I didn't warn you, he is a womanizer.
sentences.chinese: 不要說我沒告訴你他是一個花花公子。

sentences.english: He has been given a label "playboy" by his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他賭朋友給他丘了一滾花花公子”的綽慌。

sentences.english: Finally one day she hid the playboy in her covered flower basket.
sentences.chinese: 一天女僕終於將花花公子藏在了大花籃裏。

sentences.english: Belles and beaux philandered in the hotels.
sentences.chinese: 美貌女子和花花公子在旅館裏調情。

sentences.english: But there are advantages to Playboy's approach that extend beyond sidestepping the censors.
sentences.chinese: 但花花公子有辦法做到避開審查而擴展發佈平臺。

sentences.english: It's all so boring here, Margo - there's nothing but playboys and tennis pros.
sentences.chinese: 馬戈，這太無聊了，除了花花公子就是網球專家。

sentences.english: However, in real life he is a dandy .
sentences.chinese: 但在現實生活中，他卻是個遊戲人間的花花公子。

sentences.english: The future belongs to the dandy. It is the exquisites who are going to rule.
sentences.chinese: 未來屬於花花公子，而正是這些紈褲子弟將執掌權柄。

sentences.english: Home to as many poets and painters as playboys and boulevardiers, Taormina represents the creative cross-section that has made the region famous for the last 60 years.
sentences.chinese: 陶爾米納以誕生了許多詩人畫家及花花公子而出名。

sentences.english: The most contemptible of the personages in the play is the courtly fop Osric.
sentences.chinese: 劇中最可鄙的人物是風度翩翩的花花公子奧斯里克。
齊達內是個超酷花花公子嗎？

sentences.english: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 這個衣着華麗的花花公子在枝形吊燈燈光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Playboy readers are going to need glasses for a close look at the upcoming issue of the magazine -3-D glasses.
sentences.chinese: 看最新一期《花花公子》雜誌的人需要一副3D眼鏡。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:A coxcomb spends too much money and time on his clothes and appearance.
sentences.chinese: 花花公子在他的服飾及外表上花了太多的金錢和時間。

sentences.english: Snoopy and the Playboy bunny logo are often stitched onto clothing.
sentences.chinese: 史努比和花花公子的兔子標誌常見諸衣端。

definition: pampered son of a wealthy family
lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/fig. to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to fondle the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
